Timeline.title: Seagate Technology
Timeline.content: Conducted cryptographic research and built simulations for hard disks for my internship.

Timeline.title: National University of Singapore
Timeline.content: Started my double major program in Computer Science and Mathematics at NUS.

Timeline.title: DSO National Laboratories
Timeline.content: Did research on using A.I and Machine Learning to optimise SAT Solver performances on cryptographic instances.

Timeline.title: Republic of Singapore Air Force
Timeline.content: Served my 2 years of National Service as an Air Force Technician (F16) and Chief Controller of Flight. ORD-ed as 3SG.

Timeline.title: Defence Science and Technology Agency
Timeline.content: Did development of a new cryptographic module for the Montgomery Class of Elliptic Curves.

Timeline.title: Victoria Junior College
Timeline.content: Completed my Pre-University (JC) education here at VJC. I was in the 2nd batch of Further Mathematics students after its re-introduction.
